column1: The 1964 U.S. escalation in Vietnam was not justified.
The U.S. deployment of missiles to Turkey in 1961 was not a justified action.
The 2003 U.S. invasion of Iraq was not justified.
The use of atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki by the U.S. in WW2 was not necessary.
The 1983 U.S. invasion of Grenada was not justified.
The 1989 U.S. invasion of Panama was not justified.
The USAAF's 1945 bombing of Dresden did not have strategic justification.
